articles.title: WA COVID cases: Another 27 local infections recorded as reports of March reopening dismissed - The West Australian
articles.description: WA has recorded 49 new COVID-19 cases, with more than half of those local. It comes as WA Police Minister Paul Papalia dismissed reports that the State may be set to reopen mid March.
